content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as calendar_data;



EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK ''raw/calendar.csv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as calendar_data'


SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) 
WITH (
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    month TINYINT,
    day TINYINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year TINYINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT
) AS calendar_data;
